title: Logan Paul blasts KSI for trash-talking him when he was ‘vulnerable’
text:
Logan Paul slammed KSI for his trash talk during a ‘vulnerable’ time in his life (Picture: Getty Images)

Logan Paul has slammed his upcoming boxing opponent KSI for trash-talking him when he was at his most ‘vulnerable’.

The YouTube star appeared at a press conference to talk up their rematch when Metro.co.uk asked him where his issues with fellow YouTuber KSI began.

Logan explained: ‘It was cool at first and then last year he brought in a lot of personal stuff that I asked him politely offline not to.

‘I wanted to keep it friendly. And then he started s**t about my girlfriend, my family, some of the more vulnerable times in my life. And he took too many low blows for me to be respectful any more.’

Logan stormed out of the press conference last summer after his opponent ripped into his dad and girlfriend Chloe Bennet.

KSI ranted: ‘No one has your back except your ludicrous mum and your disgusting dad.’

Speaking to his dad directly, KSI said: ‘You said you’d beat me in a fight but you wouldn’t do s**t. I’m sure you’d like a round with those little girls you like kissing. You dumb, bald p***k.’

The YouTube stars are set to scrap again (Picture: Getty Images)

Logan then made a hasty exit from the stage remarking: ‘KSI has covered it. I’m outta here.’

The whole ordeal started after KSI won in a boxing match against British YouTuber Joe Weller. KSI took his victory to call out Logan which began this entire crazy buzz.

The rematch is due to take place at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Saturday 9 November.

The first match ended in a majority draw following six rounds of sparring – in an evening which also saw Logan’s brother Jake Paul go head to head with KSI’s brother Deji.

At the time Logan called for a rematch, saying: ‘I think it’s what the people want. Let’s give them a motherf*****g rematch!’ KSI was in agreement as he declared:

‘Let’s do that again, that was fun. Holy shit.’

Advertisement

KSI doesn’t want Logan to be the only Paul that he takes on in the ring, as he also his sights set on Logan’s brother Jake.

Speaking exclusively to TMZ, KSI said: ‘I want to fight Jake Paul, man. I really want to break his face.’

KSI – real name Olajide William ‘JJ’ Olatunji – and Logan’s first match ended in a draw, but if there was a winner Jake would have been next in line to take the novice boxer on.

‘I would love to break Jake’s face as well as Logan’s. I personally don’t think, as soon as I knock out Logan, I don’t think he’s gonna want to fight me,’ he said.
